item.title: Columbia University - President Bollinger Gives His Final Commencement Address at Columbia University
item.description: Video Transcript Family and friends in attendance. The president of the university, Lee C. Bollinger. It is my very, very great honor indeed. Privilege and joy to welcome you all here on this very special morning in this glorious academic setting to this magnificent occasion. I am especially sentimental today as this will be my last commencement speech. After serving more than two decades as president of Columbia University, I. I like to think
